text: Loo (maYuda) athi: “Inene uAllâh Usamkele isithembiso sethu sokuba singakholwa nakuwuphi na uMthumnywa ngaphandle kokuba azise idini eliza kuthi lidliwe ngumlilo ovela ezulwini, (lizivuthele, litshe ngokwalo lingaphenjelwanga ngumntu)”. Yithi: “Inene, bafika abaThunywa kuni phambi kwam, benemiqondiso ecacileyo, Nditsho nalo nithetha ngawo; kwathini ke ukuze nibabulale bona ukuba nithetha inyaniso?”
